TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed IdentifierCase extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies how identifiers are treated by the data source when searching the system catalog.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Identifiers may be either quoted or unquoted.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.Common.IdentifierCase Insensitive = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The data source ignores identifier case when searching the system catalog. The identifiers "ab" and "AB" will match.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.Common.IdentifierCase Sensitive = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The data source distinguishes identifier case when searching the system catalog. The identifiers "ab" and "AB" will not match.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.Common.IdentifierCase Unknown = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The data source has ambiguous rules regarding identifier case and cannot discern this information.
